availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Duncan (Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Nannie W. Webb Duncan in Princeton, Kentucky, on May 23, 1854. Father of George W. Duncan and Mary E. Duncan. Merchant in Caldwell County in 1850. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Merchant in partnership with Sandford Duncan Jr. and Ebenezer Dickey at Sandford Duncan & Co. in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
